messages.message:
Hi folks, we’ve been experiencing increased DB latency in dogfood. A possible cause of this is the large size of the deployment_configs and deployment_base_configs table which have grown to ~390k items in each. We’ve done this once before in November 2022, so at *5PM EST today*, we will be doing another cleanup of the 2 previously mentioned tables to keep only the last 180 deployments, shrinking the size of both tables to ~41k items. A backup will be taken right beforehand, and you should experience no change in behavior. Please avoid writing patches or applying base configs until 5:30PM EST

cc <!subteam^S02FJA6A7U5> @jtau
Cleanup complete :white_check_mark: hopefully this helps reduce our DB latency
